|vo_08_10_subtitle   = About [[Albedo]]
|vo_08_10_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Albedo.ogg
|vo_08_10_tx         = 알베도 오빠랑 클레는 비밀 약속을 했어! 만약 공방 문 앞에 「실험 진행 중」이라는 팻말이 있으면 조금 늦게 오라는 뜻이야. 알베도 오빠가 일이 없을 땐, 항상 클레랑 잘 놀아주니까, 클레도 참을성 있게 기다릴 거야!
|vo_08_10_rm         = Albedo opparang Keulleneun bimil yaksogeul hasseo! Manyak gongbang mun ape "Silheom Jinhaeng Jung"iraneun paetmari isseumyeon jogeum neutge oraneun ddeusiya. Albedo oppaga iri eopsseul ddaen, hangsang Keullerang jal nolajunikka, Keulledo chameulseong itge gidaril geoya!
|vo_08_10_tl         = Albedo and Klee made a secret promise! If there is a sign in front of the workshop door that says "Experiment in Progress," it means to enter a bit late. When Albedo does not have work, he always plays with Klee, so Klee will wait patiently, too!

|vo_08_11_title      = 모나에 대해…
|vo_08_11_subtitle   = About [[Mona]]
|vo_08_11_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Mona.ogg
|vo_08_11_tx         = 모나 언니는 좋은 사람이야! 매번 클레랑 알베도 오빠랑 같이 놀 때 알아들을 순 없지만 재밌는 이야기를 많이 해줘! 클레는 언니랑 노는 게 좋아!
|vo_08_11_rm         = Mona eonnineun joeun saramiya! Maebeon Keullerang Albedo opparang gachi nol ddae aradeureul sun eopjiman jaemitneun iyagireul mani haejwo! Keulleneun eonnirang noneun ge joa!
|vo_08_11_tl         = Mona is a good person! Whenever she plays with Klee and Albedo, she tells me many fun but also understandable stories! Klee loves playing with her!

|vo_08_12_title      = 설탕에 대해…
|vo_08_12_subtitle   = About [[Sucrose]]
|vo_08_12_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Sucrose.ogg
|vo_08_12_tx         = 설탕 언니는 좋은 사람이야! 클레한테 혼자 폴짝폴짝 뛰는 통통이를 갖고 싶냐고 물어봤었어! 헤헤, 당연히 갖고 싶지. 몇백 개를 가져서 몬드의 거리, 계단, 광장을 통통이로 가득 채우고 싶어!
|vo_08_12_rm         = Seoltaing eonnineun joeun saramiya! Keullehante honja poljjakpoljjak ttwineun tongtong'ireul gatgo sipnyago muleobwasseosseo! Hehe, dangyeonhi gatgo sipji. Myeotbaek gaereul gajyeoseo Mondeu-ui geori, gyedan, gwangjang'eul tongtong'iro gadeuk chaeugo sipeo!
|vo_08_12_tl         = Sucrose is a good person! She asked Klee if she wants a jumpy dumpty that bounces by itself! Hehe, of course I want it. I want to have several thousands of them and fill Mondstadt's streets, stairs, and the square full of Jumpy Dumpties!

|vo_09_01_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I

|vo_09_01_tx         = 안녕! 클레랑 같이 놀러 온 거야?
|vo_09_01_rm         = Annyeong! Keullerang gachi nolleo on geoya?
|vo_09_01_tl         = Hi! Are you here to play with Klee?

|vo_09_02_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 응, 이 폭탄은 클레가 새롭게 개조한 작품이야! 잘 만들었지? …음&mdash;&mdash;만약 방화 현장에서 찾아낸 거라면, 그럼, 내가 만든 게 아니야! 절대 아니야!
|vo_09_02_rm         = Eung, i poktaneun Keullega saeropge gaejohan jakpumiya! Jal mandeureotji? ...Eum &mdash; Manyak banghwa hyeonjang'eseo chajanaen georamyeon, geureom, naega mandeun ge aniya! Jeoldae aniya!
|vo_09_02_tl         = Mhm, this bomb is Klee's new remodeled work! Looks nice, right? ...Hmm &mdash; If you found it on an arson site, well, it's not made by me! Absolutely not!

|vo_09_03_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 새로운 폭탄 제조법은 거의 감금됐을 때 만들어지지만… 감금되는 건 싫어…
|vo_09_03_rm         = Saeroun poktan jejobeobeun geoui gamgeumdwaesseul ddae mandeureojijiman... Gamgeumdoeneun geun sireo...
|vo_09_03_tl         = A new bomb formula is almost always made when I'm confined... But I hate being confined...

|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 이건 도도코야, 클레가 아주 오래전에 사귄 친구야. 이름을 꼭 기억해둬, 자꾸 「가방에 걸려있는 인형」이라고 부르지 말라고
|vo_09_04_rm         = Igeon Dodokoya, Keullega aju oraejeone sagwin chinguya. Ireumeul kkok gieokaedwo, jakku "Gabang'e Geollyeoitneun Inhyeong"irago bureuji mallago.
|vo_09_04_tl         = This is Dodoco, Klee's friend since a long time ago. Remember its name, don't call it "The Doll Hung on the Bag"

|vo_09_05_title      = {name}에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 항상 클레의 문제를 해결해줘서 고마워! 이 「클레의 구운 생선」을 줄게!&mdash;&mdash;어, 사실 고기는 호수에서 폭파되면서 이미 익었어. 이건 평소처럼 모르는 척 하면 돼
|vo_09_05_rm         = Hangsang Keulle-ui munjereul haegyeolhaejwoso gomawo! I "Keulle-ui Guun Sangseon"eul julge! &mdash; Eo, sasil gogineun hosueseo pokpadoemyeonseo imi igeosseo. Igeon pyeongsocheoreom moreuneun cheok hamyeon dwae.
|vo_09_05_tl         = Thanks for solving Klee's problems every time! I'll give you this "Klee's Roasted Fish"... Uh, the fish was actually roasted while being blown up in the lake. You just have to act like you don't know anything about it as always.

|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 클레는 복슬복슬한 게 좋아. 도도코나 민들레 같은 거, 그리고 레이저의 머리카락도

|vo_10_02_tl         = Phew, you are a good person, and I'm a bad kid... I'll really reflect on myself this time, so when this confinement ends, please take me to play again...

|vo_13_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결

|vo_13_04_rm         = Aju oraejeon, Keullega cheoeumeuro pokbalhaneun sorireul deureosseul ttae hanado museopji anasseo... Daebubunui saramdeureun geureochi antaneun geol, najung'e arajji... Geureonde {{MC|oppa|eonni|mc=1}}do nae poktaneul an museowohane! Hehe, yeoksi Keullega joeun chingureul sagwin ge bunmyeonghae!
|vo_13_04_tl         = A long time ago, when Klee heard the sound of explosion for the first time, I wasn't scared at all... I found out later that most people aren't like me... But you are also not scared of my bombs! Hehe, Klee definitely made a good friend!
}}
